title: TimTimol AIS
mission_text: TimTimol AIS works for the development of local communities in Senegal through inclusive and innovative social action.
footer: Â© 2025 TimTimol AIS. All rights reserved.

about.title: Who are we?
about.text: TimTimol AIS was born out of the desire to connect local communities and development actors through an inclusive and solidarity-based approach.
about.team_text: Our team is made up of committed professionals from the very communities they support.

community.title: Support to Local Communities
community.text: Support for community projects, training, collective organization and access to adapted resources.

private.title: Support for Private Actors
private.text: Partnerships with local companies, CSR awareness, and support for sustainable social impact.
